name: Santa's Workshop PD Collab
description:
ARROWS: move

SPACE: jump

ENTER:  hide list / select

R: back if you get stuck or whatever

A few folks in the pixel_dailies community came together this year to make a little platformer game!

Search through Santa's workshop for all the last minute things on his list!

Code: rsvp asap & J.omar

18 artists contributed to this project. Make sure to check them all out on twitter:
